metadata.title: CVE-2021-47144 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/amdgpu: fix refcount leak[Why]the gem object rfb->base.obj[0] is get according to num_planesin amdgpufb_create, but is not put according to num_planes[How]put rfb->base.obj[0] in amdgpu_fbdev_destroy according to num_planes

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
